The Transportation Team at Tata Steel 💪

Transportation Order Details:

Good day, esteemed client! We have noted your transport needs from April 16th, 2008, through April 19th, 2008, and we are delighted to provide you with our top-notch services for this period.

Pickup Details:
Our team will be on the move between 11:15 AM and 10:15 PM on April 16th, 2008, to pick up your goods from COMPANY_PICKUP, located in ZIP_PICKUP, COUNTRY_PICKUP. Please ensure that the items are ready for collection within the stipulated time frame to avoid any inconvenience.

Delivery Details:
Our team will deliver your goods to COMPANY_DELIVERY, located in ZIP_DELIVERY, COUNTRY_DELIVERY between 10:30 PM and 2:15 AM on April 19th, 2008. We understand the importance of timely delivery, and our team will work tirelessly to ensure that your goods are delivered within the specified time frame.

Goods Information:
We will be transporting three different items, each with unique dimensions and weights. The first item measures 45 cm in length, 43 cm in width, and 41 cm in height, weighing 380 kg. The second item measures 56 cm in length, 23 cm in width, and 43 cm in height, also weighing 380 kg. The third item measures 78 cm in length, 20 cm in width, and 58 cm in height, with a weight of 380 kg as well.

Vehicle Requirements:
To cater to your specific needs, we will be using a Big lorry for this transportation order. Additionally, we have noted your special request for a Tilt required (curtain sided van), and our team will ensure that the vehicle is equipped with the necessary features to meet your requirements.

Schedule:
Our team will arrive at COMPANY_PICKUP on April 16th, 2008, between 11:15 AM and 10:15 PM to collect the goods. Afterward, we will transport the items to COMPANY_DELIVERY, located in ZIP_DELIVERY, COUNTRY_DELIVERY, where we will deliver them between 10:30 PM and 2:15 AM on April 19th, 2008.

We hope that this transportation order meets your expectations. Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any further questions or concerns. We are committed to providing top-notch services to ensure the safe and timely delivery of your goods.

text:
<<STYLE INCLUDE=INLINE>>
    Hey there! 👋 We've got a transportation order for you! 🚚💨

First things first, we need to pick up some goods from COMPANY_PICKUP in CITY_PICKUP, ZIP_PICKUP. The address is STREET_PICKUP, so make sure your truck is nice and big - we've got 222 kg of weight to carry! 💪

Our delivery point is COMPANY_DELIVERY in CITY_DELIVERY, ZIP_DELIVERY. You'll find the goods at STREET_DELIVERY - make sure you bring a Frigo truck (refrigerator truck) to keep everything nice and cool! 🥶

We need this done ASAP, so please let us know if you're available to pick up the goods today. The pickup time is [insert date and time here], and we need you to be there at [insert time here]. Don't worry, we'll give you plenty of notice for the delivery too! 🕰️
